section.heading: Rulemaking authority.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-313: § 301 of D.C. Law 24-313 provided that the creation of this section by § 104 of D.C. Law 24-313 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
